name: June 2022
title: June 2022
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IAM/pages/3548905473 - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

Table of Contents

    • Sign-In Widget, version 6.4.0
      • Hyperdrive agent, version 1.2.0
        • Okta LDAP agent, version 5.13.0
          • JIRA Authenticator Toolkit, version 3.1.9
          • Okta Browser Plugin, version 6.10.0
          • Expose groups in the LDAP interface directory information tree (DIT)
          • System Log events for telephony rate limit violations
          • Enhancements to the base OIDC IdP connector
          • OIN Manager user interface changes
          • JWT claim enhancement
          • System Log enhancement for inline hook types
          • Unique names enforced for custom admin roles
          • Improved text for resource set constraints
          • Policy condition text changes
          • Reschedule your OIE upgrade directly from the Okta Administrator Dashboard
          • Customers can opt for empty mandatory fields
          • Group limit removed for Authorization Code grant type flows

Feature

Remark

Sign-In Widget, version 6.4.0

no need to upgrade to the new version at the moment

Hyperdrive agent, version 1.2.0

not in use

Okta LDAP agent, version 5.13.0

not in use

JIRA Authenticator Toolkit, version 3.1.9

not in use

Okta Browser Plugin, version 6.10.0

not relevant

Expose groups in the LDAP interface directory information tree (DIT)

not relevant

System Log events for telephony rate limit violations

not relevant

Enhancements to the base OIDC IdP connector

not in use

OIN Manager user interface changes

not in use

JWT claim enhancement

this gives additional options to custom tokens - we do not need to use that. there is no use case for us

System Log enhancement for inline hook types

nice for

Unique names enforced for custom admin roles

not in use

Improved text for resource set constraints

nice

Policy condition text changes

not relevant

Reschedule your OIE upgrade directly from the Okta Administrator Dashboard

not relevant

Customers can opt for empty mandatory fields

we do not use SCIM integrations (yet) - the “new” behavior also sounds reasonable

Group limit removed for Authorization Code grant type flows

We are not using this and we shouldn’t

https://help.okta.com/en-us/Content/Topics/ReleaseNotes/production.htm
